item.title: Python and R
item.description: In this blog post, I am going to be sharing some neat things you can do with python. 1. You can create a list or a string: list1 = "5, 6, abc, 10, amelia, cool" print(list1) ## 5, 6, abc, 10, amelia, cool string1="Happy Birthday to my friend Chloe" print(string1) ## Happy Birthday to my friend Chloe 2. You can use regex to find certain things in a string: Here, I am having regex find the numbers and also my name.
